thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com | 17 of 1307
thread.title: Mike. S.
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Mike. S.

author: Mike. S.
title: Mike. S.
text: I have never bought tires anywhere else that TFT. Great service. I bought a lower end tires and the first time driving it in the snow proved I made a mistake. They offer money back before 30 days. I checked when I bought them and it was day 36. I called the next day to see what they would do for me. Tony(the store manager) had me come in and showed me the difference from what I bought from what he suggested. I went with his choice and he was amazing enough to have me pay only the difference in price between the tires. They offer so many free things when u buy tires from them. Thank you very much Tony in New London CT!!
